Forasmuch then as<S>3767</S> Christ<S>5547</S> hath suffered<S>3958</S> for<S>5228</S> us<S>2257</S> in the flesh<S>4561</S>, arm<S>3695</S> yourselves<S>5210</S> likewise<S>2532</S> with the same<S>846</S> mind<S>1771</S>: for<S>3754</S> he that hath suffered<S>3958</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S> hath ceased<S>3973</S> from sin<S>266</S>;
That<S>1519</S> he<S>980</S> no longer<S>3371</S> should live<S>980</S> the rest<S>1954</S> of his time<S>5550</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S> to the lusts<S>1939</S> of men<S>444</S>, but<S>235</S> to the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the time<S>5550</S> past<S>3928</S> of our life<S>979</S> may suffice<S>713</S> us<S>2254</S> to have wrought<S>2716</S> the will<S>2307</S> of the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, when we walked<S>4198</S> in<S>1722</S> lasciviousness<S>766</S>, lusts<S>1939</S>, excess of wine<S>3632</S>, revellings<S>2970</S>, banquetings<S>4224</S>, and<S>2532</S> abominable<S>111</S> idolatries<S>1495</S>:
Wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> they think it strange<S>3579</S> that ye<S>5216</S> run<S>4936</S> not<S>3361</S> with them to<S>1519</S> the same<S>846</S> excess<S>401</S> of riot<S>810</S>, speaking evil of<S>987</S> you:
Who<S>3739</S> shall give<S>591</S> account<S>3056</S> to him that is<S>2192</S> ready<S>2093</S> to judge<S>2919</S> the quick<S>2198</S> and<S>2532</S> the dead<S>3498</S>.
For<S>1063</S> for<S>1519</S> this cause<S>5124</S> was the gospel preached<S>2097</S> also<S>2532</S> to them that are dead<S>3498</S>, that<S>2443</S> they might be judged<S>2919</S> <S>3303</S> according to<S>2596</S> men<S>444</S> in the flesh<S>4561</S>, but<S>1161</S> live<S>2198</S> according to<S>2596</S> God<S>2316</S> in the spirit<S>4151</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the end<S>5056</S> of all things<S>3956</S> is at hand<S>1448</S>: be ye<S>4993</S> therefore<S>3767</S> sober<S>4993</S>, and<S>2532</S> watch<S>3525</S> unto<S>1519</S> prayer<S>4335</S>.
And<S>1161</S> above<S>4253</S> all things<S>3956</S> have<S>2192</S> fervent<S>1618</S> charity<S>26</S> among<S>1519</S> yourselves<S>1438</S>: for<S>3754</S> charity<S>26</S> shall cover<S>2572</S> the multitude<S>4128</S> of sins<S>266</S>. <sup>shall: or, will</sup>
Use hospitality<S>5382</S> one to another<S>1519</S> <S>240</S> without<S>427</S> grudging<S>1112</S>.
As<S>2531</S> every man<S>1538</S> hath received<S>2983</S> the gift<S>5486</S>, even so minister<S>1247</S> the same<S>846</S> one to another<S>1519</S> <S>1438</S>, as<S>5613</S> good<S>2570</S> stewards<S>3623</S> of the manifold<S>4164</S> grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
If any man<S>1536</S> speak<S>2980</S>, let him speak as<S>5613</S> the oracles<S>3051</S> of God<S>2316</S>; if any man<S>1536</S> minister<S>1247</S>, let him do it as<S>5613</S> of<S>1537</S> the ability<S>2479</S> which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> giveth<S>5524</S>: that<S>2443</S> God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> all things<S>3956</S> may be glorified<S>1392</S> through<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, to whom<S>3739</S> be<S>2076</S> praise<S>1391</S> and<S>2532</S> dominion<S>2904</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
Beloved<S>27</S>, think it<S>3579</S> not<S>3361</S> strange<S>3579</S> concerning the<S>5213</S> fiery trial<S>4451</S> which<S>1722</S> is<S>1096</S> to<S>4314</S> try<S>3986</S> you<S>5213</S>, as<S>5613</S> though some strange thing<S>3581</S> happened<S>4819</S> unto you<S>5213</S>:
But<S>235</S> rejoice<S>5463</S>, inasmuch as<S>2526</S> ye are partakers<S>2841</S> of Christ's<S>5547</S> sufferings<S>3804</S>; that<S>2443</S>, when<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> glory<S>1391</S> shall be revealed<S>602</S>, ye may be glad<S>5463</S> also<S>2532</S> with exceeding joy<S>21</S>.
If<S>1487</S> ye be reproached<S>3679</S> for<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, happy<S>3107</S> are ye; for<S>3754</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> of glory<S>1391</S> and<S>2532</S> of God<S>2316</S> resteth<S>373</S> upon<S>1909</S> you<S>5209</S>: on<S>2596</S> <S>3303</S> their part<S>846</S> he is evil spoken of<S>987</S>, but<S>1161</S> on<S>2596</S> your part<S>5209</S> he is glorified<S>1392</S>.
But<S>1063</S> let<S>3958</S> none<S>3361</S> <S>5100</S> of you<S>5216</S> suffer<S>3958</S> as<S>5613</S> a murderer<S>5406</S>, or<S>2228</S> as a thief<S>2812</S>, or<S>2228</S> as an evildoer<S>2555</S>, or<S>2228</S> as<S>5613</S> a busybody in other men's matters<S>244</S>.
Yet<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> any man suffer as<S>5613</S> a Christian<S>5546</S>, let him<S>153</S> not<S>3361</S> be ashamed<S>153</S>; but<S>1161</S> let him glorify<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S> on<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> behalf<S>3313</S>.
For<S>3754</S> the time<S>2540</S> is come that judgment<S>2917</S> must begin<S>756</S> at<S>575</S> the house<S>3624</S> of God<S>2316</S>: and<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> it first<S>4412</S> begin at<S>575</S> us<S>2257</S>, what<S>5101</S> shall the end<S>5056</S> be of them that obey not<S>544</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of God<S>2316</S>?
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1487</S> the righteous<S>1342</S> scarcely<S>3433</S> be saved<S>4982</S>, where<S>4226</S> shall<S>5316</S> the ungodly<S>765</S> and<S>2532</S> the sinner<S>268</S> appear<S>5316</S>?
Wherefore<S>5620</S> <S>2532</S> let<S>3908</S> them that suffer<S>3958</S> according to<S>2596</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S> commit the keeping<S>3908</S> of their<S>1438</S> souls<S>5590</S> to him in<S>1722</S> well doing<S>16</S>, as<S>5613</S> unto a faithful<S>4103</S> Creator<S>2939</S>.
